tha-ap465:0.3_0: As a consequence his he was grueficted by senior monks.
tha-ap465:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap465:2.4_0: and the fruits of the fairies.
tha-ap465:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap465:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap465:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vāsava.
tha-ap465:7.1_0: The senior monk who had gone forth and the third part of the senior monks.
